Text:
Use MPC 
http://cccp-project.net/ 
to be able to automatically recognize
and play the external Audio tracks or mux the Audio in MKV with mkvmerge 
http://www.videohelp.com/tools/MKVtoolnix 
if you wish to use other player.
MP4 is Better than MKV! It is much easier to convert to Dvd and the picture is just as clear!
